messages.content:
Hello Shiva, 

In context to recent demolitions by HYDRAA, We,at 1acre.in, are digitising HMDA lakes with their FTL and buffer zones so people can understand if their lands falls in these zones instantly. 

Link : www.1acre.in/lakes

We believe it helps a lot of people who are currently in distress. See if you can help spread the word about this :) 

Thanks,
Team 1acre
